name: Proceedings of the Annual Convention of the Hermetic Brotherhood of Atlantis
mytitle: Proceedings of the Annual Convention of the Hermetic Brotherhood of Atlantis, Luxor and Elephanta (IAPSOP)
content:
Proceedings of the Annual Convention of the Hermetic Brotherhood of Atlantis, Luxor and Elephanta (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: The Hermetist Summary:   From Pat Deveney's database: Annual Convocation of the H.B. of A., L. and E., Proceedings of the [Eighth]. 1894—1901? Annual Chicago, IL, and then San Francisco, CA. Editor: W.P. Phelon. 1/1, 1894-1901(?) Annual reports on the Hermetic Brotherhood of Atlantis, Luxor and Elephanta. Prior years convention reports were published in The Hermetist. W. P. Phelon died in San Francisco in December of 1904, and the leadership of the HB ALE passed to Frances (sometimes Francese) Rogers. On Phelon and the brotherhood, see the note under The Hermetist. University of California, Berkeley, microfilm Issues:HB ALE Seventh Annual Convocation 1900 HB ALE Eighth Annual Convocation 1901 HB ALE Eighth Annual Convocation 1901 (Version 2) HB ALE Ninth Annual Convocation 1902 HB ALE Ninth Annual Convocation 1902 (Version 2) HB ALE Tenth Annual Convocation 1902 HB ALE Tenth Annual Convocation 1902 (Version 2) HB ALE Eleventh Annual Convocation 1902 HB ALE Eleventh Annual Convocation 1902 (Version 2)
